css

  • /// # Scale Configuration /// @group scale /// @link http://oddbird.net/accoutrement-scale/docs/ /// Accoutrement Scale $_ratio: get-function('ratio'); $_size: get-function('size'); // Ratios // ------ /// @group scale /// @ratios $modular-scale: ( 'text-ratio': 1.6, ); @include add-ratios($modular-scale); @include herman-add('ratios', 'modular-scale', $modular-scale, $_ratio); // Text Sizes // ---------- /// @group scale /// @sizes text-sizes

    color

    variables

    [private] _color

    $_color: get-function('color');

    Description

    Color Configuration

    Links

    • Accoutrement Color

    brand-colors

    $brand-colors: (
  '_brand-main': #d10300,
  '_brand-accent': #d6b362,
  '_brand-gray': '#_brand-main'
    (
      'desaturate': 90%,
    ),
);

    Description

    The brand is defined by our primary brand blue, along with secondary pink and orange base colors.

    Type

    Map

    shade-colors

    $shade-colors: shades-of($brand-colors, 4);

    Description

    Tints and shades of the brand colors.

    Type

    Map

    contrast-colors

    $contrast-colors: (
  'contrast-light': #fff,
  'contrast-dark': color('#_brand-gray-dark-4'),
);

    Description

    The light and dark contrast colors act as the high and low range of our palette. These colors should not be dynamic.

    Type

    Map

    theme-colors

    $theme-colors: (
  'background': '#contrast-light',
  'text': '#contrast-dark',
  'text-light': '#_brand-gray-dark-2',
  'border': '#_brand-gray-0',
  'border-light': '#_brand-gray-light-1',
  'action': '#_brand-main',
  'action-hover': '#_brand-main-dark-4',
  'accent': '#_brand-accent',
  'accent-light': '#_brand-accent-light-4',
);

    Description

    Main theme colors will be set as relative CSS variables â€“ applying the above colors to more specific use-cases. This map should not include any color-adjustments.

    Type

    Map

    fonts

    variables

    system-font

    $system-font: (
  'name': 'system',
  'stack': (
    'system-ui',
    'sans-serif',
  ),
  '300': (
    'local': $_system-local,
  ),
);

    scale

    variables

    [private] _ratio

    $_ratio: get-function('ratio');

    Description

    Scale Configuration

    Links

    • Accoutrement Scale

    modular-scale

    $modular-scale: (
  'text-ratio': 1.6,
);

    text-sizes

    $text-sizes: (
  'root': 16px,
  'responsive': calc(%s + %s)
    (
      '%s': '#root' 0.25vw,
    ),
  'large': 1rem
    (
      'text-ratio': 0.5,
    ),
  'xlarge': calc(%s + %s)
    (
      '%s': '#large' 0.75vw,
    ),
  'small': 1rem
    (
      'text-ratio': -0.5,
    ),
  'xsmall': 1rem
    (
      'text-ratio': -1,
    ),
);

    spacing-sizes

    $spacing-sizes: (
  'rhythm': '#root'
    (
      'text-ratio': 1,
      'convert-units': 'rem',
    ),
  'gutter': '#rhythm',
  'double-gutter': '#gutter'
    (
      'times': 2,
    ),
  'spacer': calc(%s + %s)
    (
      '%s': '#double-gutter' 4vmin,
    ),
  'shim': '#gutter'
    (
      'times': 0.5,
    ),
  'half-shim': '#shim'
    (
      'times': 0.5,
    ),
  'quarter-shim': '#shim'
    (
      'times': 0.25,
    ),
);

    component-sizes

    $component-sizes: (
  'icon': 1em,
);

    page-sizes

    $page-sizes: (
  'page': 42rem,
);

    break-sizes

    $break-sizes: (
  'page-break': '#page'
    (
      'times': 2,
      'convert-units': 'browser-ems',
    ),
);

    css

    /// # Scale Configuration /// @group scale /// @link http://oddbird.net/accoutrement-scale/docs/ /// Accoutrement Scale $_ratio: get-function('ratio'); $_size: get-function('size'); // Ratios // ------ /// @group scale /// @ratios $modular-scale: ( 'text-ratio': 1.6, ); @include add-ratios($modular-scale); @include herman-add('ratios', 'modular-scale', $modular-scale, $_ratio); // Text Sizes // ---------- /// @group scale /// @sizes text-sizes

    /// # Scale Configuration
/// @group scale
/// @link http://oddbird.net/accoutrement-scale/docs/
///   Accoutrement Scale

$_ratio: get-function('ratio');
$_size: get-function('size');

// Ratios
// ------
/// @group scale
/// @ratios
$modular-scale: (
  'text-ratio': 1.6,
);

@include add-ratios($modular-scale);
@include herman-add('ratios', 'modular-scale', $modular-scale, $_ratio);

// Text Sizes
// ----------
/// @group scale
/// @sizes text-sizes { ... }

    Description

    Scale Settings

    Links

    • Accoutrement Scale
